PHRASE.LANG: The feathers each represent different accomplishments. [#Legal]
Chaque plume raconte un exploit passé. [#Legal]
Jede Feder steht für eine andere Errungenschaft. [#Legal]
Ogni piuma rappresenta un risultato diverso. [#Legal]
Cada una de las plumas representa un logro distinto. [#Legal]
The feathers each represent different accomplishments. [#Legal]
